title: 16 Running Myths That Are Holding You Back
description: There’s a lot to think about when you think about running: your pace, your shoes, whether you’re stretching and strength training enough, and more. title: Make Ultra-Tender Biscuits With Oat Flour
description: The quest for tender biscuits always starts out the same—smashing butter, flour, and liquid together—and yet, it can end in all sorts of ways. title: Expensive Credit Cards That Don't Seem Worth It, But Are
description: There are a lot of expensive credit cards on the market these days: Some of them have annual fees that can be as high as $500, so it’s natural to wonder if they’re really worth it. title: How to (Legally) Get Out of Jury Duty
The Best Way to Grill That Last Bit of Summer Corn
description: Haters will say grilling season is coming to a close, but autumn is actually my favorite time to grill, because standing in the hot sun next to a hot grill kind of sucks. Corn season, however, is quickly dying down, which means you need to grill that last bit of sweet corn before it disappears for the year.

title: The XBox Accessibility Settings You Aren’t Using, but Should Be

title: Use This App to Block Ads and Reels From Instagram
description:
Instagram is going through an identity crisis. Should it be more like TikTok? More like Facebook? It hasn’t been itself for years now, and in the process, it’s annoying the hell out of everyone.

title: How to Transition Your Plants Indoors for Winter
description: Houseplants can be finicky. That’s because when they’re growing in a pot, they don’t get the same interaction with other species or the same type of soil as outdoor plants. title: Everyone Should Sit Down When They Pee
description: People with penises: If you’ve spent your life standing when you pee, it’s time to rethink your urinary posture. title: The Difference Between Problem-Based and Emotion-Based Coping
description: When you’re dealing with undue stress, there’s no one right way to cope with the challenge. title: You Can Still Get DVDs From Netflix (and Maybe You Should)

title: Five Clever Ways You Should Be Using a Hot Glue Gun, But Aren’t
description: For most people, a hot glue gun seems like the kind of thing you would need for a homemade decoration or craft project. But glue guns have come a long way since your days of arts and crafts day at summer camp. Hot glue now comes in different types and colors, and you can do more with them than just decor.
